title: 90 - Caitlin Doughty (Smoke Gets in Your Eyes)
description:
You may know her from her very popular web series, Ask a Mortician, from a previous episode of this podcast (#25), or as the author of the fantastic book, Smoke Gets in Your Eyes: And Other Lessons from the Crematory. Caitlin and I talk about life, death, and publishing. 



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
dc:creator: Chris Ryan
itunes:author: Chris Ryan
itunes:subtitle: Author, mortician, good death advocate
